title: Fell Types Revival
content: You can find some Fell Types revival fonts, expecially the larger sizes, at [www.iginomarini.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211916/http:/www.iginomarini.com/) . There's also an history of these beautiful Oxford University Press Types.
author: igino_marini

comments.content:
Iginio this is an extense work, why are you giving it?   
   
As you built the fell types with the ikern application I

Frank Blokland and the Dutch Type Library are working in a Dr. Fell's types revival: DTL Fell.   
 [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/DTLFell.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211916/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/DTLFell.html)   
 [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/FellRegular.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211916/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/FellRegular.html)
Oh my god. iKern. Amazing. You should release the app as shareware or as outright-buy-it-ware.
I forgot about testing the types, but it did the test this morning, overall they produce a pleasant texture and do not show any serious spacing flaw, still they need to be detailed.
